author: cmpilato
msg: Update and reformat sections of this document.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make 'svn info' submit to the new handling of --changelist.
(info_found_entry_callback): Only transmit info for items that match
info for items that match requested changelists (if any).
(svn_cl__info): Stop crawling for changelist items, and just pass
the changelists option baton item through to svn_client_info2().

author: pburba
msg: Rename svn_opt_parse_revision2 to more apt svn_opt_parse_revision_to_range.
The docstring for svn_opt_parse_revision2() was describing itself in terms of
svn_opt_parse_revision() which is the opposite of how we normally document
revved APIs.  Not only that, but it was really different enough to qualify as
a new API rather than a replacement for svn_opt_parse_revision().
First an apr_array_header_t ** is unnecessary, apr_array_header_t * is
fine.  Second, rename ranges_to_merge to opt_ranges.
(): Update call to svn_opt_parse_revision2() to now call

author: hwright
msg: Fix JavaDoc references to reflect updated method interfaces.
